post.description: Using this API, you can Create a template for a particular app

elementName.description: The name of a template. Element name is unique for a WABAs namespace.

languageCode.description: Language code for the template. Refer to all the language codes [*here*](https://support.gupshup.io/hc/en-us/articles/360013321939).

category.description:
The category of your template. Possible Values: AUTHENTICATION, MARKETING and UTILITY.
If you submit the templates with the any other categories, you will receive an error Invalid category provided, kindly use category from these option AUTHENTICATION, MARKETING, UTILITY.

templateType.description: The type of template: TEXT, IMAGE, LOCATION, VIDEO, DOCUMENT, PRODUCT and CATALOG

content.description: The body of the template. Character limit: 1028. For “Authentication” category the first line should be - {{1}} is your verification code.
content.example: your ticket has been confirmed for {{1}} persons on date {{2}}.

header.description:
Header of the template. 
 1. Applicable for templateType = Text Character limit: 60. 
2. Not applicable for “Authentication” category and template type “CATALOG”

footer.description: Footer of the template. Character limit: 60. Not applicable for “Authentication” category, only set based on code_expiration_minutes value

buttons.description:
* Used only if your template has a CTA. An example is also submitted if a URL button has variable parameter. For “Authentication” category OTP button type is supported with two otp_type:
	1. COPY_CODE
	2. ONE_TAP
If otp_type is set to ONE_TAP. 

* Three additional parameters are required:

	1. autofill_text
	2. package_name
	3. signature_hash
buttons.example: [{"type":"PHONE_NUMBER","text":"Call Us","phone_number":"+919872329959"},{"type":"URL","text":"Book A Demo","url":"https://bookins.gupshup.io/{{1}}","example":["https://bookins.gupshup.io/abc"]}] or for “Authentication” category: [{"type":"OTP","otp_type":"COPY_CODE","text":"Copy OTP"},{"type":"OTP", “otp-type”: “ONE_TAP”, "text":"Book A Demo", "autofill_text": "Autofill", #One-tap buttons only "package_name": "com.example.myapplication" #One-tap buttons only , "signature_hash": "K8a%2FAINcGX7", #One-tap buttons only }]

example.example: your ticket has been confirmed for 4 persons on date 2020-05-04.

enableSample.description: Required for creating all types of templates.

allowTemplateCategoryChange.description: Boolean value. If True, Meta will automatically update the category of the template as per the template content. Default value is False. If the category gets updated, you can view the oldCategory from the Get Templates API.

exampleHeader.description: Not applicable for template type: CATALOG

addSecurityRecommendation.description: Optionally for "Authentication" category a security disclaimer is added to content - For your security, do not share this code.

codeExpirationMinutes.description: Optionally for “Authentication” category the following text is added to footer - This code expires in <NUM_MINUTES> minutes. Code expiry time should be between 1 and 90 minutes.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Your app token, please refer [**Get access token api**](https://www.gupshup.io/docs/partner/#collapse-TokenApis-App_7CGetAccessToken) to get the token from partner documentation.

containerMeta.example: {"appId":"a41b30f4-d202-4fdb-911e-3a8fbfbfb756","data":"Your verification code is {{1}}.","footer":"This is the footer","sampleText":"Your verification code is 213.","sampleMedia":"4::aW1hZ2UvcadG5n:ARYaMMMA2QvIXuQZdPjWVXTOqfoBU3n0L1Ftyg4w57yxi9nD105yQDvW2nu3-HNo9HGefxZ-Ig-HAi3YSsckwIsOEUwxSPatsxT0Niob30E63A:e:1634884682:2281283925530161:100033655335566:ARaBAxW-1L-ZRu6SMSg","enableSample":true,"editTemplate":false,"allowTemplateCategoryChange":false,"addSecurityRecommendation":false}

data.example: Your verification code is {{1}}.\nThis is the footer

message.example: You do not have the required permissions to access this API

get.description:
Using this API, you can get the list of templates for a an app. You will get the rejection reason for templates.

 *Note: Starting from 29th March 2023, Meta will migrate your templates to the new categories. Once we get the new category for your template, the old template category will be associated with the parameter oldCategory, and the new category will be associated with the parameter category. You will not see the oldCategory parameter until the new category is received. You will also receive a template category-update event on your callback URL notifying of the change. Learn more about it [here](https://docs.gupshup.io/docs/system-events#template-events).*

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Your app token, please refer [**Get access token api**](https://www.gupshup.io/docs/partner/#collapse-TokenApis-App_7CGetAccessToken) to get the token from partner documentation.

post.description: Using this API, you can upload your sample media and generate a ***handleId*** for it. Using the ***handleId***, you can create and submit a template along with a sample media. The handleId is passed in the ***exampleMedia*** parameter of the ***Apply for templates with sample media*** API.

file_type.description: Upload a file from your local machine.

file.description: Attach the file you want to upload here

post.description: Using this API, you can send template message with *templateID*

source.description:
Phone number to send message from. 

Required phone Number With Country Code

destination.description:
Phone number of the customer to send the message to. 

Required phone Number With Country Code.

template.description:
Required when templateType is PRODUCT AND CATALOG. 

Create template format using templateId and product code

src.name.description: App name, whose appId used while creating template

message.description:
1. Required when templateType is LOCATION, TEXT
2. Not applicable when template type PRODUCT and CATALOG

channel.description: Messaging channel to send message on.
